description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a filter screen, including UI layout, state management of filter options such as height, weight, hair color, religion, and ethnicity, and interactions like resetting filters and applying them. It interacts with provider-based state management and contains UI components with sliders, checkboxes, and buttons.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays filter options with actions to reset and apply filters.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: A stateful widget that provides the main filter options UI, including sliders and checkbox groups.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Resets the filter provider state and shows a snack bar notification.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets local filter values for height and weight to defaults and shows a snack bar.

methods.name: _buildEnumCheckboxGroup
methods.description: Builds a group of checkbox options for enum-based filter choices.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names to human-readable labels by adding spaces before capital letters.
